content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_db;

-- reading trip data green.csv

SELECT *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = true
) as [result]

-- getting schema from result

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK ''trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = true
) as [result]'


-- rading data with defined schema

SELECT *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = true
) 
WITH 
(
    VendorID BIGINT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2,
    lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2,
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID BIGINT,
    PULocationID BIGINT,
    DOLocationID BIGINT,
    passenger_count BIGINT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee FLOAT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type BIGINT,
    trip_type BIGINT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
)
as [result]

-- getting file name from which record is coming

SELECT result.filename() as file_name,
*
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = true
) 
WITH 
(
    VendorID BIGINT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2,
    lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2,
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID BIGINT,
    PULocationID BIGINT,
    DOLocationID BIGINT,
    passenger_count BIGINT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee FLOAT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type BIGINT,
    trip_type BIGINT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
)
as [result]

-- getting count of records from each file

SELECT result.filename() as file_name,
        result.filepath() as file_path,
        result.filepath(1) as year,
        result.filepath(2) as month,
        count(1) as no_of_records
FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = true
) as [result]
WHERE [result].filepath(1) = 2020
    and [result].filepath(2) in (2, 4, 6)
group by result.filename(), 
        result.filepath(),
        result.filepath(1), 
        result.filepath(2)
order by no_of_records desc;
